cmp: 上 (on/on top/upon/first (of two parts)/previous or last (week, etc.)/upper/higher/above/previous/to climb/to go into/above/to go up)
卡 (to check/to stop/to block/card, customs station/to be choked/to fasten/to clip/to wedge/checkpost)

exm.mng: (onom.) breaking or snapping, cut it out, stop it (colloquial), also written 喀嚓[ka1 cha1]
